General.Name: Vitreous Glass Inc
General.Description: Vitreous Glass Inc. cleans, crushes, and sells waste glass to the fiberglass manufacturing industry in Canada. The company offers its products to fiberglass insulation manufacturers for use as a raw material in their production facilities. Vitreous Glass Inc. is headquartered in Airdrie, Canada.
General.Address: 212 East Lake Boulevard NE, Airdrie, AB, Canada, T4A 0H5
